alert.note: Alert for Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 24 at 12:00AM PST until December 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio, Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley, and Carmel Valley and Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
